thread.title_full: Good hotel - usual Premier Inn - Review of Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Neil2509
title: Good hotel - usual Premier Inn -
text:
Usual Prem Inn hotel. Comfortable clean room no frills but perfect for me. Reasonably priced and quiet
Very close to tube and 20 mins from centre. Easy to get to from the motorway travelling from the North
Would recommend it to people looking for the same thing
